name: The Fourth Wall (itch) (Proobly)
description:
In need of a game to play in just one sitting? Feeling a bit bummed after 100%'ing your favorite mythological bullet hell game? Try your luck with battling it out with some possessed items you'd find at a movie theater!

Controls
Left mouse button - Attack
WASD - Movement
Space - Dash

NOTE: It seems like there are audio delays/bugs in the web version. Besides that, the web version should be fully playable!

Made for the 2022 Secret Santa Jam. I tried incorporating elements of my giftee's letter into the game, so I'm hoping they're able to squeeze a bit of enjoyment from it!

I was envisioning this to have more maps and enemies but I definitely need to hone my asset crafting skills before scoping big ideas for a game jam!

Special Thanks
- kenney.nl: Tileset & Player sprite
